summary: An affair between the second in line to Britain's throne and the princess of the feuding Irish spells doom for the young lovers.
cast: James Franco|Sophia Myles|Rufus Sewell|David O'Hara|Mark Strong|Henry Cavill|Bronagh Gallagher|Ronan Vibert|Lucy Russell|JB Blanc|Graham Mullins|Leo Gregory|Dexter Fletcher|Richard Dillane|Hans Martin Stier|Thomas Morris|Jamie Thomas King|Wolfgang Müller|Cheyenne Rushing|Barbora Kodetová|Isobel Moynihan|Thomas Brodie-Sangster|Gordon Truefitt|Myles Taylor|Jack Montgomery|Marek Vasut|David Fisher|Bronwen Davies|Kevin Flood|Philip O'Sullivan|Nevan Finegan|Jón Ólafsson|Todd Kramer|Winter Ave Zoli|Miroslav Simunek
title: Tristán e Isolda
